column2: THIS IS CHARLIE BLACK. OBJECTIVE ONE IS ACCOMPLISHED. OVER.
CHARLIE REPORTING. IN POSITION AND READY TO ATTACK LAMENTIN. SEND IN THE PARATROOPS. OVER.
OKAY PEOPLE, LET'S TAKE THIS CITY. NOW MOVE MOVE!
ENEMY INFANTRY DETECTED IN DELTA SECTOR. ENGAGING. OVER.
OUR SECTOR IS CLEAR. PROCEEDING TO THE RENDEZVOUS POINT. OVER.
ROGER THAT CHARLIE. SENDING THE BACKUP. PAPABEAR OUT.
ALL RUSSIANS ARE DEAD OR FLEEING. GOOD JOB LAMENTIN IS SECURE. OUT.
